SEARCH
Package project.star_wars_universe.cli

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
project.star_wars_universe.cli.CLI
public class CLI extends Object
The main class of the CLI. It is responsible for reading, validating and processing the user input and invoking the correct Command handler for executing the desired behaviours.

      public CLI()

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      This is the entry point of the CLI. It takes care of initial preparations, such as displaying a welcome message, initializing a Scanner class and starting a loop for reading, processing and validating user input and passing it to the logic responsible for choosing the correct command based on this input.

    • processInput

      public void processInput()
      Processes the raw user input. Firstly, the processedInput is cleared. Secondly, the rawInput is read character by character. If a quotation mark is encountered, the inQuotes variable, responsible for noting whether the subsequent input should be separated by spaces or should be treated as a whole segment, gets toggled. If a space is encountered and the current character is NOT a part of a quotes enclosed segment, the current segment is added to the processedInput, the current segment gets cleared and the loop continues on to the next character. If not, the current character gets added to the current segment. Lastly, after the last character of the rawInput is read, it is checked whether the current segment is empty and if it is not it gets added to the processedInput.

    • readInput

      public void readInput()
      Extracts the correct command from the CommandsList based on the first segment of the processedInput and execute it, passing the processedInput it it's Command.execute(List) method. If it fails to find such a command of another type of CommandExecutionException occurs, an appropriate error message and a help message are displayed in the console.

    • printWelcomeMessage

      public void printWelcomeMessage()
      Prints the welcome message

    • printHelpMessage

      public void printHelpMessage()
      Prints the help message
